mapper.select: SELECT tpmbc.*, ts.design_no, tpm.pattern_no, tpm.sample_type_name, tpm.pat_seq_name, ts.year_name, ts.season_name, ts.brand_name FROM t_pattern_making_bar_code tpmbc LEFT JOIN t_pattern_making tpm on tpmbc.head_id = tpm.id and tpm.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_style ts on tpm.style_id = ts.id and ts.del_flag = '0' where tpmbc.del_flag = '0' ${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
